name: large porcelain bowl
description:
porcelain bowl. approx 9" wide, 5" high. 

wheel thrown. glazed white and glassy blue, with red abstract drawing on the outside.

food/microwave safe. handwash preferable.

all items in this store are made in the wabi sabi tradition. irregular textures and surfaces are part of the work.

name: white porcelain bowl
description:
white porcelain bowl. approx 8" wide x 3.5"-4.5" high. height varies slightly for each bowl.

wheel thrown, then hand-altered.

glazed matte white, with some warm speckles/tones.

food/microwave safe. handwash preferable.

name: porcelain bisque light
description:
porcelain asymmetrical light fixture, for use as a small table light. can be re-wired to hang as a pendant light.

this piece is bisque-fired only. completely unglazed, to retain a soft, chalky finish. FRAGILE.

approx 6" wide x 9"high, not counting the height of the light bulb.  brass socket cap, and brass coupling at base.

1 small globe light bulb included. on/off switch wired halfway down the cord. this fixture is wired to U.S. standards.

name: set of 2 altered vessels
description:
2 porcelain vessels. approx 5.5" wide, heights vary. see photos.

glazed white. some warm speckles and tones. partially unglazed.

food safe. please handwash.

all items in this store are made in the wabi sabi tradition. crazing, crackling, and other irregular textures and surfaces are part of the work.

name: large umber and white porcelain bowl
description:
porcelain bowl. approx 8" wide, 4" high. 

wheel thrown. glazed clear, with smokey, abstract marks on the exterior.

food/microwave safe. however, handwash preferable.

other sizes available. please see other listings for more bowls in this series. 

our products are made in the wabi sabi tradition. crazing, irregular textures and marks are part of the work.
